name: Jumping Dash!! α
description:
Jump your way to the goal through 5 increasingly difficult stages!

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, mouse to look and spacebar to jump.

KNOWN BUGS

- The timer doesn't reset if you choose to play again after you've completed the game.

- Music was made in about 5 minutes using Bosca Ceoil, so I should probably have added a mute button.
